mapper.select: SELECT postnum as postNum, title, content, uploaddate as uploadDate, recommend, imageurl as imageUrl, category, userid as userId FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (POSTNUM, TITLE, CONTENT, UPLOADDATE, IMAGEURL, CATEGORY, USERID) VALUES(POSTNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{imageUrl}, #{category}, #{userId})
